title: MEMES, Bonus: The Chorus
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Amory and Ben team up with NPR to take on Twitter Spaces. This bonus episode is a recording of ET's 11/30 livestream chat with meme experts Kenyatta Cheese (Know Your Meme), "meme librarian" Amanda Brennan and Garbage Day newsletter author Ryan Broderick.
itunes:author: WBUR
itunes:title: MEMES, Bonus: The Chorus
